medications.name: Inderal
evidence_spans: Therapeutic trial of Inderal 40mg - 1/2 tab b.i.d. x 1 week, then 1 tab. b.i.d. x 1 week then 1 tab t.i.d

patient_summary: The patient is a male who is experiencing headaches. He has a history of migraines and has tried over-the-counter medications without success. He is currently taking Inderal and is scheduled for a follow-up appointment in one week. The doctor wants to see the patient again in one week to see how he is doing.
notes: The patient has a chronic progressive course of migraines. The doctor is trying to find the best medication for the patient. The patient is not using alcohol.
